description: Fluffy naan bread is topped with spicy hoisin barbecue sauce and juicy baked pineapple chunks in this flavor-packed little vegan pizza.
name: Pineapple & Smoky Baked Tofu Pizza with Spicy Hoisin Barbecue Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 lb. extra firm tofu (drained and pressed at least 20 minutes)
1 cup pineapple chunks (about 1/4 of a pineapple)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice tofu into squares with about 1 inch sides, about 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick.

Stir soy sauce, vinegar, maple syrup or agave, and liquid smoke together in a shallow dish. Place tofu in dish and spoon mixture overtop to coat. Optionally, allow to marinate at room temperature for up to one hour (I skipped this step, so feel free to do so as well).

Preheat oven to 400o. Line a baking sheet with parchmet and arrange tofu squares in a single layer on top. Bake abot 40 minutes, gently flipping and basting with any excess marinade about halfway through.
